item.title: CAD Final Projet
item.description:
ğŸ¯ Objective

Demonstrate Inventor proficiency by modeling an accurate Ender 3 Pro.

âš™ï¸ Tools & Setup

  • Hardware: Ender 3 Pro, Calipers
  • Software: Autodesk Inventor

ğŸ§  Process

  1. Tore down the Ender 3 Pro to create a parts list
  2. Create a full part list of needed files
  3. Using both real-world parts and online schematics, model every part needed
  4. Assemble all of the final parts to create the overall design.
